attributes.title: this app is disgusting✨🤢
attributes.review: it spreads out false information and crashes my phone. it also spams the hell out of you. DO NOT RECOMMEND😟

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I opened this app because my dog said I should. I was IMMEDIATELY greeted with a racist, white supremacist, CHEETO! My dog said this was about TREES! I wanted to see some beautiful Japanese cherry blossoms, but no. This app GAVE ME COVID 19! I WANT TO SPEAK TO TRUMP *D I R E C T L Y* ABOUT THIS ISSUE! WHAT DO YOU THINK YOURE DOIN GOIN ROUND GIVIN EVERYONE COVID 19 YOU CHEETO?

attributes.title: The president doesn’t have a cleaner app???
attributes.review: And it’s spying on my phone collecting my data, imagine that the president spying on his own people, his own supporters!!

attributes.title: IM SO MAD!
attributes.review: I almost dropped my phone when I saw some orange thing on the front. They should not scare us like this. i’m so disappointed.

attributes.title: Trump 2020
attributes.review: This app is abysmally inept! Trump is a pedo and a non human why did he get elected to begin with he has no charisma and he is without class! A one star is fitting for his election app it’s a non starter!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: HATED IT! don’t get this app it’s a waste of time and there are just so many things wrong with it that need 2 be improved.

attributes.title: Poorly Designed
attributes.review: This app is designed poorly and has a bunch of misleading content.

attributes.title: Really ✨✨bad✨✨
attributes.review: I downloaded ⬇️ this lovely 😊 app 😳 to support 🥳 my favorite ❤️ orange 🍊 man! But 💔 when I opened 🔓 the app ☺️ all I saw 👀 was a clown 🤡!! If I could 🥴 I would leave ➡️ a 0 🤭 Star ✨ review ☺️.

attributes.title: yikes
attributes.review: i really did intend to support my beautiful unproblematic president, but i realized that I absolutely hated the app... i don’t know... i just kept getting like racist, sexist, homophobic vibes?

attributes.title: It’s horrible!!
attributes.review: This app is the worst!! It is filled with such horrible content!! Soooo boring 🤢 also it started glitching horribly and it’s just the worst !!!!
